raw_json.main_html:
Do you need a custom R package or Shiny dashboard for your team?

Posted on August 31, 2025 by pacha.dev/blog in R bloggers | 0 Comments

[This article was first published on pacha.dev/blog, and kindly contributed to R-bloggers]. (You can report issue about the content on this page here)
Want to share your content on R-bloggers? click here if you have a blog, or here if you don't.

Because of delays with my scholarship payment, if this post is useful to you I kindly ask a minimal donation on Buy Me a Coffee that shall be used to continue my Open Source efforts. If you need an R package or Shiny dashboard for your team, you can email me or inquiry on Fiverr. The full explanation is here: A Personal Message from an Open Source Contributor

I build production-ready R tools that solve business problems.

Whether you need to:

  • Automate workflows with custom R packages
  • Create interactive dashboards for data exploration
  • Integrate C++/SQL for blazing-fast performance
  • Standardize analyses across your organization

I can help. I am an Engineer with Master’s in Statistics and Political Sciencem and I have been maintaining R packages in last ten years that resulted in consultancy projects for multiple clients to solve data problems combining R, C++ and SQL. You can view my Open Source work on GitHub.

Why work with me?

I’ve built 20+ open-source R packages used by researchers and businesses worldwide since 2015:

  • Data extraction: TabulaPDF (extract tables from PDFs), Cpp11tesseract (OCR for text extraction)
  • Data quality: Pointblank (data validation framework)
  • Econometrics: Capybara (fast fixed-effects models), Gravity (structural gravity estimation), Leontief (input-output analysis)

What I offer

Custom R packages

  • Turn repetitive code into reusable functions
  • Create organization-specific functions to query data and get KPIs
  • Support team’s best practices

Shiny dashboards

  • Interactive data exploration tools
  • Real-time monitoring dashboards
  • Custom reporting interfaces

Let’s build something together

From $40 CAD/hour (30 USD/hour) for consultations to fixed-price projects for complete packages.

Send me a message with your requirements, and I’ll respond within 24 hours asking clarifying questions to ensure I understand your needs.

Related

To leave a comment for the author, please follow the link and comment on their blog: pacha.dev/blog.
